text: Zvirokwazvo, Allah vakaregerera Muporofita (SAW), maMuhaajiroon (maMuslim vakatama vachibva kuMakkah vachienda kuMadinah), uye maAnsaar (maMuslim emuMadinah), vakamutevera (Muhammad (SAW)) munguva dzakaoma (kuhondo yeTabook) mushure mokunge moyo yevamwe vavo yakange iri pedyo nokurasika (kubva pagwara rakanaka), asi vakabvuma shanduko yavo. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vane ngoni zhinji, netsitsi dzakanyanya
